params.rawAmount: The number of tokens that are approved (2^256-1 means infinite)
params.spender: The address of the account which may transfer tokens

returns._0: Whether or not the approval succeeded

allowance(address,address).notice: Get the number of tokens `spender` is approved to spend on behalf of `account`

approve(address,uint256).notice: Approve `spender` to transfer up to `amount` from `src`

balanceOf(address).notice: Get the number of tokens held by the `account`

getCurrentVotes(address).notice: Gets the current votes balance for `account`

getPriorVotes(address,uint256).notice: Determine the prior number of votes for an account as of a block number

permit(address,address,uint256,uint256,u.notice: Triggers an approval from owner to spends
